column4: does ANYONE have a rough cpu req for youtube to perform properly under ubuntu/firefox? my video card should be able to handle it, and it's accelerated
it's probably your flash version
finally, someone answers! I asked that a while ago, if it might be the plugin
how do i check the plugin version?
Yeah what plugin do you have installed?
er, flash i suppose *lol*
You didn't install it?
might have last night when i was half asleep ;)
I don't recall if it ws something installed after ubuntu or if it came with it
OH! now i remember, i did install it. not sure of the source I got it from...
/me face palms
okay, got it. it's flash player 9
I think that should be okk
you would think a 1GHz CPU should be able to handle it, and the video card. I have no problem with local AVIs
It's probably bandwidth then
nahhh, the video rendering is lagged
if i lower the quality, it reduces the lag a bit
That's kinda strange
Yeah.. I may just have to try another browser perhaps...
Oh trust me you can make it so
That's probably true. But more bloated than XP? I get better performance out of XP than I ever do from linux, for some reason...
